mainText:
Life is a book in volumes three-
The past, the present, and the yet-to-be.

The past is written and laid away,

The present we're writing every day,
 
And the last and best of volumes three
 
Is locked from sight - God keeps the key.

I will always remember the day I was given my very first Mac computer, a Mac Classic.
and ever since, I have been a true believer in Apple. and will always. 

Thank you Steve...
you will not be forgotten.
header: Offering my condolences to the family and friends.
